summary.span: 提供一个基类，要用作证据的所有对象都必须派生自该类。

span.span: Provides a base class from which all objects to be used as evidence must derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]之前，如果托管代码要将其应用为证据，几乎任何对象都可以用作证据对象。Before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], almost any object could be used as an evidence object if the hosting code wanted to apply it as evidence. 例如，某些 .NET Framework 代码将 对象视为证据。For example, some .NET Framework code recognized objects as evidence. 公共语言运行时（CLR）将证据对象视为 引用，而不会将任何类型安全应用于它们。The common language runtime (CLR) considered evidence objects as references, and did not apply any type safety to them. 这会出现一个问题，因为存在对哪些类型可用作证据对象的隐式限制。This presented a problem because there were implicit restrictions on which types could be used as evidence objects. 具体而言，用作证据的任何对象都必须是可序列化的，并且无法 `null`。Specifically, any object used as evidence had to be serializable and could not be `null`. 如果未满足这些要求，则只要执行了要求其中一个假设的操作，CLR 就会引发异常。If these requirements were not met, the CLR threw an exception whenever an operation that required one of these assumptions was performed. 所有证据对象均必须派生自的 类在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 中引入，以启用可用作证据的对象类型的约束并提供向所有证据对象添加新功能和要求的功能。The class, which all evidence objects must derive from, was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] to enable constraints on the types of objects that can be used as evidence and to provide the ability to add new features and requirements to all evidence objects. 类确保在实例化时证据对象可序列化。The class ensures, upon instantiation, that the evidence object is serializable. 此外，它还可以通过向基类添加新的默认实现来创建新的证据要求。In addition, it enables new evidence requirements to be created by adding new default implementations to the base class. CLR 用作证据对象的所有类型都已在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 中更新，以从 派生。All the types used by the CLR as evidence objects have been updated in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] to derive from .
